feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SE 45 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Fog patches developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm except locally 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
